text: wayueadhib allah almunafiqin walmunafiqat walmushrikin walmushrikat aladhin yazunuwn znana syyana biallah 'anah ln yansur nabih walmuminin maeah ealaa aedayhm, walan yuzhr dynh, faealaa hwla' tadur dayirat aleadhab wakulu ma ysw'hm, waghadib allah elyhm, wtrdhm min rhmth, waedd lahum nar jhnm, wasa'at munzalana ysyrwn 'ilyh
